title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: P. Cleveland to [Thomas P. Jackson], May 6, 1867
summary: Cleveland forwards the letter to him written by Poe about the marriage of Peggy Brown to a man named Ben. Cleveland relates Ben's complaint that Poe mistreated him and kept him from his wife.
keywords: Violence/Crime, Family, Slavery, Women, Community Values/Local Behavior, American Civil War
